chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
this: nid
W: world
V: world
K: hooks
A: Type
w: injects V W K
e: DT this V A

Goal:
inject_prog (code_of e) \In has_spec this W inject_s

Premises:
inject_prog = fun T : prog V A this => Prog (or_introl (erefl Unfinished)) : prog V A this -> prog W A this
has_spec : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), spec A -> Simpl_Pred (prog W A this)
List.In : forall A : Type, A -> seq A -> Prop
injects = Injection.injects : world -> world -> hooks -> Type
code_of : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (e : DT this W A), DTbin this W (spec_of e)
Inductive DT (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) : Type := with_spec : forall s : spec A, DTbin this W s -> DT this W A Arguments DT _ _ _%type_scope Arguments with_spec [this W] [A]%type_scope [s]
bind_has_spec : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type) (e1 : DT this W A) (e2 : A -> DT this W B), bnd_prog (code_of e1) (fun x : A => let y := e2 x in code_of y) \In has_spec this W (bind_s e1 e2)
rely_split : forall (V W : world) (K : hooks) (w : injects V W K) (this : nid) (s1 : state) (s1' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s2' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), s1 \In Coh V -> s2 \In Coh V -> network_rely W this (s1 \+ s1') (s2 \+ s2') -> network_rely V this s1 s2 /\ network_rely (inj_ext w) this s1' s2'
Inject : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (V : world) (K : hooks), injects V W K -> proc this V A -> proc this W A
rely_ext : forall (V W : world) (K : hooks), injects V W K -> forall (this : nid) (i : state) (j : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s : state), i \In Coh V -> network_rely W this (i \+ j) s -> exists i' j' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, s = i' \+ j' /\ i' \In Coh V
sem_extend : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks), injects U V K -> forall (s1 s2 s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \+ s \In Coh V -> s2 \+ s \In Coh V -> network_step U this s1 s2 -> network_step V this (s1 \+ s) (s2 \+ s)
rely_split' : forall (V W : world) (K : hooks) (w : injects V W K) (z : nid) (s1 : state) (s1' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s2' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), s1 \In Coh V -> s2 \In Coh V -> network_step W z (s1 \+ s1') (s2 \+ s2') -> network_step V z s1 s2 /\ network_step (inj_ext w) z s1' s2'
inject_set = fun (T : prog V A this) (t : proc this W A) => t = Unfinished \/ (exists t' : proc this V A, t' \In T /\ t = Inject w t') : prog V A this -> proc this W A -> Prop
alw_inject : forall (V W : world) (K : hooks) (A : Type) (w : injects V W K) (this : nid) (p : proc this V A) (P : state -> proc this V A -> Prop) (i j : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), i \+ j \In Coh W -> always i p P -> always (i \+ j) (Inject w p) (fun (m : state) (q : proc this W A) => exists i' j' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ m = i' \+ j', i' \In Coh V, network_rely (inj_ext w) this j j' & (exists q' : proc this V A, q = Inject w q' /\ P i' q') \/ (exists v' : A, q = Ret v' /\ P i' (Ret v'))])
ret_has_spec : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (x : A), ret_prog this W x \In has_spec this W (ret_s this W x)
sem_split : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks) (w : injects U V K) (s1 : state) (s1' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s2' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \In Coh U -> s2 \In Coh U -> network_step V this (s1 \+ s1') (s2 \+ s2') -> network_step U this s1 s2 /\ s1' = s2' \/ network_step (inj_ext w) this s1' s2' /\ s1 = s2
DTLattice.bot_spec : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : spec A), DTLattice.bot_prg this W A \In has_spec this W s
cohK : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks) (w : injects U V K), V = U \+ inj_ext w \+ (Unit, K)
bind : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type), DT this W A -> (A -> DT this W B) -> DT this W B
DTbin_make : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : spec A) (prog_of : prog W A this), prog_of \In has_spec this W s -> DTbin this W s
DTLattice.sup_spec : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : spec A) (es : Pred (DTbin this W s)), DTLattice.sup_prog es \In has_spec this W s
aft_inject : forall (V W : world) (K : hooks) (A : Type) (w : injects V W K) (this : nid) (p : proc this V A) (P : A -> state -> Prop) (i j : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), i \+ j \In Coh W -> after i p P -> after (i \+ j) (Inject w p) (fun (v : A) (m : state) => exists i' j' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ m = i' \+ j', i' \In Coh V, network_rely (inj_ext w) this j j' & P v i'])
act_has_spec : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), act_prog a \In has_spec this W (act_s a)
extends : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks), injects U V K -> union_mapPCM Label dstatelet -> union_mapPCM Label dstatelet -> Prop
Record injects (U V : world) (K : hooks) : Type := Inject { E : world; _ : hook_complete U /\ hook_complete E; _ : V = U \+ E \+ (Unit, K); _ : hooks_consistent (U \+ E) K; _ : forall s : state, Coh V s < -> (exists s1 s2 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ s = s1 \+ s2, Coh U s1 & Coh E s2]); _ : forall (s1 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \+ s \In Coh V -> network_step U this s1 s2 ->...-> network_step U this s1 s2 /\ s1' = s2' \/ network_step E this s1' s2' /\ s1 = s2 } Arguments Injection.Inject [U V K E] _ _ _ (_ _ _)%function_scope
stepInject : forall (this : nid) (V W : world) (K : hooks) (A : Type) (em : injects V W K) (s1 : state) (t : proc this V A) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (q : proc this W A), pstep s1 (Inject em t) sc s2 q <-> (exists (s1' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (v : A), [/\ sc = InjectRet, t = Ret v, q = Ret v, s2 = s1 & extends em s1 s1']) \/ (exists (sc' : schedule) (t' : proc this V A) (s1' s2' s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), [/\ sc = InjectStep sc', q = Inject em t', s1 = s1' \+ s, s2 = s2' \+ s, s1 \In Coh W & pstep s1' t sc' s2'...
bind_s : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type), DT this W A -> (A -> DT this W B) -> spec B
Injection.Exports.Inject : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks) (E : world), hook_complete U /\ hook_complete E -> V = U \+ E \+ (Unit, K) -> hooks_consistent (U \+ E) K -> (forall s : state, Coh V s <-> (exists s1 s2 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ s = s1 \+ s2, Coh U s1 & Coh E s2])) -> (forall (s1 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \+ s \In Coh V -> network_step U this s1 s2 -> network_step V this (s1 \+ s) (s2 \+ s)) ->...-> Injection.injects U V K
Injection.Inject : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks) (E : world), hook_complete U /\ hook_complete E -> V = U \+ E \+ (Unit, K) -> hooks_consistent (U \+ E) K -> (forall s : state, Coh V s <-> (exists s1 s2 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ s = s1 \+ s2, Coh U s1 & Coh E s2])) -> (forall (s1 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \+ s \In Coh V -> network_step U this s1 s2 -> network_step V this (s1 \+ s) (s2 \+ s)) ->...-> Injection.injects U V K
cohE : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks) (w : injects U V K) (s : state), Coh V s < -> (exists s1 s2 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ s = s1 \+ s2, Coh U s1 & Coh (inj_ext w) s2])
a_safe : forall (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid), Actions.action W V this -> state -> Prop
Actions.a_safe : forall (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid), Actions.action W V this -> state -> Prop
DT_rec : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (P : DT this W A -> Set), (forall (s : spec A) (d : DTbin this W s), P (with_spec d)) -> forall d : DT this W A, P d
DT_ind : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (P : DT this W A -> Prop), (forall (s : spec A) (d : DTbin this W s), P (with_spec d)) -> forall d : DT this W A, P d
DT_rect : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (P : DT this W A -> Type), (forall (s : spec A) (d : DTbin this W s), P (with_spec d)) -> forall d : DT this W A, P d
DT_sind : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (P : DT this W A -> SProp), (forall (s : spec A) (d : DTbin this W s), P (with_spec d)) -> forall d : DT this W A, P d

```coq
intros.
unfold inject_prog.
rewrite <- (inject_set (code_of e) (inject_prog (code_of e))).
apply bind_has_spec.
Qed.

original: intros. unfold inject_prog. rewrite <- (inject_set (code_of e) (inject_prog (code_of e))). apply bind_has_spec.
